name: King of Fighters R-2
description: 'King of Fighters R-2' (abbreviated version of Round 2) is a fighting video game for the Neo Geo Pocket Color (NGP forwards compatible), and is the sequel to 'King of Fighters R-1'. It was developed and published by SNK on March 19th, 1999. It features an extensive cast of characters from the fighting genre, including 'Fatal Fury', 'Art of Fighting', 'Ikari Warriors' and a bundle of new characters compared to R-1. Unlike its previous installment, R-2 was also localized within Europe and North America.
